activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#8555
activity.text:
Hey @aparnacoronasafe  I have gone through all the issues mentioned above I can solve them so Could you assign it to me ? 
I have few doubts regarding `Vitals- when user tries to enter values by typing, it doesn't get recorded unless the user also selects the option from the dropdown. This is very frustrating. The user must be able to add values by simply typing in the fields as well.` so I need to put a validation check when users types in and tries to proceed further ?

activity.text:
> @AdityaJ2305 can you clear the merge conflict and comment on the PR, if it's ready for review or not



> Can we gitignore the output file (`supportedBrowsers.ts`) and call the script during dev and build instead?

Like following way:
`"build": "npm run generate-build-meta && npm run supported-browsers && npm run build:react"`
previously
`"build": "npm run generate-build-meta && npm run build:react"`
Is this modification permissible?

activity.text: > > > > Is the CSS for the `BrowserWarning` component okay, or should I adjust it? > > and Can I put this browserWarning comp in the ErrorPages folder in the component ? > > In which browser did you face this issue can u plz say me ..
